title: Eyes On Iowa, Google Grampa 2.4.20
itunes:title: Eyes On Iowa, Google Grampa 2.4.20
description:
In episode 562, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Yelling About Pâté podcast co-host Karl Hess to discuss ghost kitchens, the Senate's conclusion to the impeachment trial, the Iowa caucuses, children's books being used as protest, an in-depth analysis of the Super Bowl, Budweiser's Super Bowl ad, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Ghost kitchens open up in ghost malls to serve...ghost patrons?
  2. Impeachment trial heads to historic end in frenetic week
  3. How do the Iowa caucuses work?
  4. Saratoga Springs author releases new book
  5. Scholastic Under Fire for Children’s Book Portrayal of Trump
  6. New Book 'The Pumpkin And The Pantsuit' Explains The 2016 Election To Kids
  7. 21 Books Set In a Post-Trump World
  8. A colorful children's book tries to explain border walls
  9. Watch the Entire Super Bowl LIV Halftime Show, Starring Shakira and Jennifer Lopez
  10. 2020 Super Bowl commercials: Rewatch the ads that ran during Super Bowl LIV on Sunday
  11. Trump and Bloomberg Super Bowl Ads Provoke Sharp Viewer Reactions
  12. WATCH: Budweiser | Typical American | 2020 Super Bowl Commercial
  13. Budweiser slammed for using Charlotte 2016 protest footage in Super Bowl beer commercial
  14. WATCH: Budweiser Super Bowl Commercial 2017 Born The Hard Way
  15. Budweiser uses a Super Bowl ad to tell an obscure immigrant story — its own
  16. A Boycott Budweiser movement begins over Super Bowl immigration ad
  17. WATCH: Denny Laflare - Number 7 Intro

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
